page.title: 16Changing Times in Aboyne
page.content: Aboyne has changed within the past few years as much as it did within the past century. About ten years ago there was a sudden influx of people because of the{North Sea Oil} development in Aberdeen. This led to {houses}being built in every available space throughout Aboyne. New {businesses}were set up and Aboyne started to take on a new look. Aboyne Business Centre was opened at the beginning of 1984 and included a range of businesses from hairdressing to surveying. Today Aboyne has much more {tourism}than ever before and is well equipped for it, hosting a caravan park situated beside the loch, golf course and a number of hotels and restuarants. Aboyne is now much more commercialised and no longer the sleepy village it was at one time.
